summary: Fixed all bugs in Beauty Booking module code: 1) Date parsing bugs in BeautyBooking model (4 methods: canCancel, calculateCancellationFee, isUpcoming, isPast), 2) Date parsing bug in BeautyCalendarService (hasOverlappingBooking), 3) Top rated scope too restrictive (made badge requirement optional). All date parsing now handles Carbon objects correctly. Top rated queries work even without badges.
current_status: All module bugs fixed. Date parsing working correctly in all methods. Top rated scope now works without requiring badges. System fully operational.
